variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Age at time of sample collection
variable.comment: Samples with the same SAMPID may have been collected from the individual at different ages and submitted to the repository independently

variable.name: COLLECTION
variable.description: NIGMS source collection for sample [chromosomal aberrations, inherited disorders]

variable.name: DESCRIPTION
variable.description: Name of diagnosed disease or category of aberration

variable.name: ISCN
variable.description: International System for Human Cytogenetic Nomenclature description; the majority do not contain the array results
variable.comment: The cytogenetic characterization of samples were performed using a variety of techniques at various times. The ISCN descriptions for samples with the same SAMPID may not be identical due to when they were characterized as well as the fact that they are derived from independent cell lines
